1. at very top, change

<link rel="shortcut icon" href="a.png" type="image/x-icon"/>
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="a.png" type="image/x-icon"/>
change to a.png

2. open resume link, go through doc and update other links => internal links
   index.html
   PROJECTS.html
   Contact.html

3. Search for "sourceMappingURL=wix-freemuim-css-entry.css.ma", then from first </style> to if, copy paste-
</style><a class="desktop-top" id="top" data-aid="WIX_ADSdesktopTop" <span class="contents"><span class="text"> <span></span><span class="com" ></span> </span></span></a></div><div id="aspectCompsContainer" class="siteAspectsContainer"></div><script id="partiallyVisibleBeat">

4.go to wix-ads-2, and make all height, width, border 3px to 0px to remove adds
